key.name: append-ts-to-file
key.description: Appends a timestamp, in UNIX time, to the ends of filenames

key.name: auto-capture
key.description: Toggles automatic capturing of pictures.

key.name: auto-capture-interval
key.description: Specifies the interval for automatic capture of pictures.

key.name: device
key.description: The unix file system path to the device that's assigned to your camera.

key.name: drawdate
key.description: Toggles the drawing of a datestamp within the captured pictures

key.name: file-type
key.description: Specifies the image format to be used for locally saved pictures

key.name: height
key.description: Image height used by the camera. Zero means autoselect

key.name: hostname
key.description: Hostname for the FTP server for remote captures.

key.name: local-capture
key.description: When capturing pictures via the "Take Picture" button, or with auto capture, this key toggles the saving of pictures locally.

key.name: remote-proto
key.summary: Protocol to use for remote access
key.description: The URI name of the protocol that will be used to connect to a remote server. Can be ftp, sftp or smb

key.name: remote-uri
key.summary: Complete URI used to store image snapshots remotely
key.description: The complete URI of the last successful access to a remote server, including protocol, host and remote directory

key.name: remote-append-ts-to-file
key.description: Appends a timestamp, in UNIX time, to the ends of remote filenames

key.name: remote-capture
key.description: When capturing pictures via the "Take Picture" button, or with auto capture, this key toggles the saving of pictures to a remote server.

key.name: remote-file-type
key.description: Specifies the image format to be used for remotely saved pictures

key.name: remote-save-dir
key.description: Folder for saving captured pictures remotely

key.name: remote-save-file
key.description: Name for the filename of uploaded images.

key.name: remote-timestamp
key.description: Toggles the insertion of a timestamp into the images for FTP upload.

key.name: save-dir
key.description: Folder for saving captured pictures to locally

key.name: save-file
key.description: Filename for saving captured pictures to locally

key.name: timestamp
key.description: Toggles the insertion of a timestamp into local images

key.name: timestamp-string
key.description: Defines a string of custom text to be inserted into the image.

key.name: use-custom-string
key.description: Toggles the use of the custom string for the timestamp in images.

key.name: show-adjustments
key.description: Toggles the use of the sliders to adjust the video properties

key.name: show-effects
key.description: Toggles the use of the buttons to adjust the video filters

key.name: width
key.description: Image width used by the camera. Zero means autoselect
